info.author: Parker Pinette
info.description:
# remder
### Renders a Markdown Document in a Web Browser

Usage:  

    $ remder document.md


0.1
---

11.18.12	-	Initial release. serve a rended .md document on port 8080	
			Todo: Provide a way to select another md doc, or input text for rendering
			      Offer command line options - port, help/usage, etc.
			      Add some page style. 

0.2
---

12.19.12	-	Added console_script entry point.

0.2.1

12.20.12	-	Changed name to reMDer, added port argument to cl script
info.name: remder
info.summary: Render a markdown document in a browser
info.html_description:
# remder ### Renders a Markdown Document in a Web Browser

Usage:

$ remder document.md

0.1

11.18.12 - Initial release. serve a rended .md document on port 8080
Todo: Provide a way to select another md doc, or input text for rendering
Offer command line options - port, help/usage, etc. Add some page style.

0.2

12.19.12 - Added console_script entry point.

0.2.1

12.20.12 - Changed name to reMDer, added port argument to cl script
